game.title: The Missing Scroll
game.objective: Retrieve a lost scroll from the ancient ruins.
game.description: A valuable scroll has gone missing from the library's archives. The player must navigate treacherous ruins to retrieve it before it falls into the wrong hands.

tasks.objective: Find the entrance to the ancient ruins.
tasks.description: Search the surrounding area for a hidden passage or secret door.
tasks.location: The old oak tree in the center of the forest

tasks.description: Use your wits to avoid deadly traps and find a safe route through the ruins.

tasks.objective: Retrieve the scroll from the treasure chest.
tasks.description: Solve the puzzle lock on the chest to claim your prize.
tasks.location: The treasure room in the west wing of the ruins
